evidence.claim: Cookonnect utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure including compute and storage through AWS Lambda and S3.
The platform supports healthcare data integration using HL7 and FHIR standards.
Cookonnect has documented REST APIs for data access and integration.
Claims processing involves adherence to EDI X12 transaction sets within the healthcare domain.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or EDI processes found on their site.
